experience.title: Project Manager
responsibilities: Manage high-visibility, cross-functional initiatives to reduce hospital 30-day unplanned readmissions
Apply structured project management practices including RIDAC tracking, scope and schedule management, and status reporting
Oversee 80+ inpatient clinical operations data and analytics requests
accomplishments: Selected to represent organization at Epic's 2025 XGM conference
Streamlined analytics delivery and enhanced resource management

experience.title: Program Coordinator
responsibilities: Managed project meetings for Clinical Operations Data Office – Inpatient
Led Clinical Safety and Effectiveness project team using Six Sigma methodology
Facilitated planning and execution of Mock Code Program implementation
Developed and maintained program budgets for Code Blue Operations and Emergency Readiness
accomplishments: Developed comprehensive downtime process for central scheduling

experience.title: Sr. Administrative Assistant
responsibilities: Analyzed financial and business expense reports using spreadsheets and dashboards
Collaborated with upper leadership on Operations and Maintenance budget of ~$10M
Mentored and coached administrative team members
accomplishments: Achieved 48% reduction in outstanding purchase orders by streamlining procurement process
Utilized Zero-Based budgeting methodology to drive efficiency and cost savings

experience.title: Administrative Assistant
responsibilities: Provided administrative support to Director and Assistant Directors of Operations & Maintenance
Coordinated meetings, generated materials, and composed communications to stakeholders
Assisted with special projects including data clean-up for transition to Maximo CMMS
accomplishments: Developed and implemented comprehensive onboarding program
